article_title: One Of Pharma's Biggest Enemies Goes After The Future's Best-Selling Drug

article_metadata.author: Matthew Herper

og.description: Over the past two decades, U.S. Representative Henry Waxman has given the drug industry good reason to fear him. Waxman (D.-California) humiliated Merck in open hearings by publicizing sales training materials that indicated the company had instructed its reps to deliberately downplay the heart risks of the pain pill Vioxx -- [...]
